name: Dream Lands - spin the wheel of fortune
name_original: Dream Lands - spin the wheel of fortune
description:
Join adventurers in the most magical game «Dreamlands Adventures: Wheel of Fortune»!
Spin wheel of fortune to win golden coins and defend your island from other players. Organize air raids on your competitors! Join the cheerful adventures and become the new dream keeper!
Set off to conquer next island after you have fully built your current one and saved it in your money box! Build castles, erect mountains, decorate treasury and grow fancy trees! Your island is your treasure, protect it from being stolen or destroyed.
Additional features:
-Collect daily rewards and get free COINS!
-Take the change out of players, who destroyed your house and stole your treasure.
-Use golden coins to open and upgrade new cloud islands.
Adventures are waiting for you!
